channel.title: I need some help
channel.description: ok...on my server the emote tabs are like home, shops, mb, gw, and stuff... and i put all the ppl at shops at home becuz i want to make shops where u kill abby demons for whips so on the emote tab i want it to say whips instead of shops...plz help

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Rocketbean, post:9, topic:265074”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=349964.msg2689584#msg2689584 date=1235878485]

Can you please write in proper English because its hard to decode what you are saying. I mean, I might as well be reading Japanese or Korean

Yes, and just a future reference (No offense im just telling you.) in proper English a comma is used before a conjunction. Such as “and, because, or, and so”.
[/quote]
I wasn’t trying to be a grammar Nazi, I was just asking for a cohearnt sentance. Besides, I find it to be much easier on the eyes when I type like this.[/quote]

Sorry; I am much of a grammar Nazi, although I do screw up sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @Rocketbean Rocketbean
item.description:
@Rocketbean wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:8, topic:265074”][quote author=Rocketbean link=topic=349964.msg2689443#msg2689443 date=1235872215]
Can you please write in proper English because its hard to decode what you are saying. I mean, I might as well be reading Japanese or Korean
[/quote]

Yes, and just a future reference (No offense im just telling you.) in proper English a comma is used before a conjunction. Such as “and, because, or, and so”.[/quote]
I wasn’t trying to be a grammar Nazi, I was just asking for a cohearnt sentance. Besides, I find it to be much easier on the eyes when I type like this.

Read full topic
